channel.title: Forum Awards
channel.description:
[i][b]Here is a list of all of the awards:[/b][/i]
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/pikastaff.gif[/img] [i]Pika cup[/i] Awarded to Mods and Admins.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/santapika.gif[/img] [i]Santa Pika Cup[/i] Awarded to Admins and Mods, in the festive holiday season.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/valentinepika.gif[/img] [i]Valentine Pika Cup[/i] Awarded to Admins and Mods, during valentine.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/squirtle.gif[/img] [i]Squirtle cup[/i] Awarded to Ex-Mods and Ex-Admins.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/batman.gif[/img] [i]Bat cup[/i] Awarded to helpful people.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/scarcup.gif[/img] [i]Scar Scripters cup[/i] Awarded to people who are good at scar scripting.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/duke3d.gif[/img] [i]Java cup[/i] Awarded to the best Java Coders.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/duke3dchristmas.gif[/img] [i]XMas Java cup[/i] Awarded to the best Java Coders, in the festive holiday season.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/Kakuna.gif[/img] [i]VB/Kakuna cup[/i] Awarded to vb coders. (Symbolises the hidden capabilities of vb).
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/Flare.gif[/img] [i]Delphi/Flareon cup[/i] Awarded to delphi coders. (Symbolises the power of delphi).
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/c.png[/img] [i]C Cup[/i] Awarded to the best C programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/togepi.gif[/img] [i]C++ cup[/i] Awarded to skilled C++ coders.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/csharp.png[/img] [i]C# Cup[/i] Awarded to skilled C# programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/python.png[/img] [i]Python Cup[/i] Awarded to skilled Python programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/lisp.png[/img] [i]Lisp Cup[/i] Awarded to the best Lisp programmers.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img] [i]Web Developer/Onix cup[/i] Awarded to good web developers (html, php, jsp etc.)
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/arccup.gif[/img] [i]AutoRune Crew cup[/i] Awarded to people who used to be on the autorune crew.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/srldev.gif[/img] [i]SRL Developer cup[/i] Symbolizes being an SRL Dev.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/lapras.gif[/img] [i]Graphics Master[/i] Awarded to graphics masters of the site.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/dragonite.gif[/img] [i]IRC Legend[/i] Awarded to Moparisthebest IRC legends.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/SOTWWinner.png[/img] [i]SOTW Winner[/i] Awarded to winners of SOTW.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/lpotm.png[/img] [i]LPOTM Winner[/i] Awarded to winners of LPOTM.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/mcwaward.png[/img] [i]MCW Winner[/i] Awarded to winners of the MoparScape Model Contest competition.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/bulbasaur.gif[/img] [i]MoparScape Moderator[/i] Awarded to MoparScape moderators.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/santabulbasaur.gif[/img] [i]Santa Bulbasaur Cup[/i] Awarded to MoparScape moderators, in the festive holiday season.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/caterpie.gif[/img] [i]Programming Moderator[/i] Awarded to moderators of the programming section.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/charmander.gif[/img] [i]Other Moderator[/i] Awarded to moderators of the other section.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/persian.gif[/img] [i]Games Moderator[/i] Awarded to moderators of the games section.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/pinan2.gif[/img] [i]RS2 Dev Moderator[/i] Awarded to moderators of the RS2 dev section.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/scarmod.gif[/img] [i]SCAR Moderator[/i] Awarded to moderators of the SCAR section.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/vulpex.gif[/img] [i]General Moderator[/i] Awarded to moderators of the general section.

item.title: Forum Awards
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

[quote=“S!ms, post:233, topic:1720”][quote author=cow821 link=topic=1766.msg538747#msg538747 date=1164695606]
What happened to the gold bars? The award were if you hit the max rep lock at 200 or went over that before it was locked. Squig was a god…
[/quote]

You got the gold bars if you had 300+ rep. But that’s just impossible here :P[/quote]
Not really. Alot of rep is given to undeserving people around here. So 300 rep is possible. Rep doesn’t mean a thing anymore sadly.

Read full topic

That was back at kaitnieks im pretty sure

Ye kaitnieks not here.[/quote]
